## Tables in R sandbox

```{r Tables & Graphs - 1 Cat Variable}
Campus=c("Avenida de Berna", "Campo Santana", "Campus de Campolide", "Caparica", "Carcavelos")
Students=c(5234,1234,2321,8646,3278) 
table=table(Campus=Campus)
table
```

Now adding the Students vector as new row

```{r}
Students[1:5]

```

```{r}
table[5:2] #need to understand this tables thing better
table[1:5]=Students
table

```

### Barplot

simple barplot example

```{r Barplot}
barplot(table)
```

### Pie chart

Simple pie chart example

```{r Pie chart}
pie(table, main="Campus", sub="NOVA Fall undergraduates")

```
